messages.content: I need an ambulance and police. I don't care who.
What's the address of the emergency?
I just found my father murdered in his bathroom.
I just found my father murdered, tied in his bathroom, and his car has been stolen.
Okay, you don't have any idea what happened, sir?
No, I just have been trying to get a hold of him for days and I decided to come over to his house.
Hold on one second. Let me get help started that way, okay?
